body_html: Apologies for the delayed response. Is your .so file being generated in the same directory as the script that loads it? If so, you should be able to say data = ["zero_out_op.py"] and then load the op library using tf.resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile('zero_out.so'). If you grep the codebase, particularly in contrib, you should see many examples of this.

body: Apologies for the delayed response. Is your .so file being generated in the same directory as the script that loads it? If so, you should be able to say `data = ["zero_out_op.py"]` and then load the op library using `tf.resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile('zero_out.so')`. If you grep the codebase, particularly in contrib, you should see many examples of this.
